title: Who is your favorite recording artist of all time? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Lady Gaga. She’s an expert in this music galaxy. She’s extremely eager in indulging her appearence within the infinite meaning of art. This genius Gaga is expected to shine throughout her career without fail bcs she is super talented and multitasker. I mean like, she could make great musics, sing live, transform her music genre in a blink (pop, ballad, jazz, pop-rock), perform on stage like a god, become an actress, win lots-to-name awards, express people’s problems into the concern of the public, inspire the weak and never be anyone but herself. She is not just a singer, she’s everything you could name in this world

Pink Floyd. Their music still moves me and I have been listening to the same four or five albums for almost 25 years. No one sounds like Floyd. The musicianship is second-to-none. The song writing is deep and thoughtful. Their music is like some sweet and savory dessert that fills every musical hunger.
